title: Chicago boy, 6, playing 'cops and robbers' kills brother using dad's illegal gun, police say
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: US News - Today 
Police subsequently arrested the boys' father, 25-year-old Michael Santiago, on a felony child endangerment charge....
